div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I, Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill.

body.p: Sunday, February 23, at Robey Hall, 2000 Armitage Avenue (corner of Robey Street), the Russian section of the Socialist Party 'Karl Marx' is arranging a lecture on the subject: "The Beginning of the End." The lecturer is Comrade Markin.
The lecture will start at 6:30 P. M. Admission free.
